Question
========

A closed bag contains 15 black and 10 white marbles. John and Peter simultaneously randomly pick up two marbles. John wins if two marbles of the same color are taken. Peter wins if two different colored marbles are picked. Who has the greatest chance of winning?

Answerlist
----------

* They have an equal chance.
* John has the greatest chance.
* Peter has the greatest chance.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* They are equally likely...: Correct
* John has the greatest chance Incorrect
* Peter has the greatest chance: Incorrect
